scripts.after-start: npm run checkers && npm run bc-deploy && npm run test && npm run watcher && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.after-start-no-watcher: npm run checkers && npm run test && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.all: CLIENT=openethereum npm run before-start && npm run start-test-setup-openethereum && npm run after-start
scripts.all-nethermind: CLIENT=nethermind npm run before-start && npm run start-test-setup-nethermind && npm run after-start
scripts.all-nethermind-no-watcher: CLIENT=nethermind npm run before-start && npm run start-test-setup-nethermind && npm run after-start-no-watcher
scripts.bc-deploy: cd ./bc/contracts && npm i && npm run deploy && cd .. && git clone https://github.com/gnosischain/lighthouse-launch.git launcher && cd launcher && git checkout 18fbd5dad0dec201a4547669af4425eaaa46ab94 && cd .. && rm -rf launcher/keys && mv keys launcher && node ./scripts/configure-launcher.js && cd launcher && docker-compose up validator-import && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d node && docker-compose up -d validator && docker pull ghcr.io/gnosischain/deposit-script:latest && cd ../deposit-script && docker run --rm --network host --env-file $(pwd)/.env -v $(pwd)/deposit_data.json:/tmp/deposit_data.json ghcr.io/gnosischain/deposit-script:latest /tmp/deposit_data.json
scripts.before-start: npm i && npm run get-all-submodules && npm run cleanup && npm run compile-posdao-contracts && npm run make-spec
scripts.cleanup: npm run stop-test-setup && rm -rf ./accounts ./bc/launcher ./bc/deposit-script ./config ./data && git checkout ./accounts && git checkout ./config && git checkout ./data && git checkout ./bc/keys
scripts.compile-posdao-contracts: cd ./posdao-contracts && npm i && npm run compile
